name: Huge Swordsman: Stick Fighters
description:
1v1 Game featuring 4 different traits or abilities for each character.

Wizard

wasd  = move 

j = staff attack (generates 30 mana)

k = projectile attack (costs 25 mana)

l = summon fairy (costs 100 mana)

hold w to fly/float

Rogue

click yellow blocks to grapple to them

left mouse button = stab (generates 15 mana)

right mouse button = place bomb (costs 25 mana)

middle mouse button = shuriken storm (costs 100 mana)
